PAR1.S1: Tom and Kate were sitting at the table eating.
PAR1.S2: Their mother was busy getting their lunch boxes ready, so they were talking to their father

PAR2.S1: "You are slow today, Tom and Kate," said their mother.
PAR2.S2: "You will have to stop talking and eat up your apples and drink your milk."

S2.TOM: "And Tom, you still have some milk left. You two are very slow today."

PAR3.S4: She put one apple in Kate's lunch box, and the other in Tom's lunch box.
